name: The Room (itch) (Han Xue)
description:
The Room is a first-person item hunting/sandbox game hybrid set in a modern Japanese style room. The play aim is to find three items in the room. However, take your time to explore the room.

Controls are WASD for movement, CTRL or Spacebar for crouching, Q for zooming in and Left Shift for sprinting. 

The three icons on the bottom of the screen show how far you are from the item. Green = Far, Red = Close.

Game Mechanics, UI and Audio: Elliot Walker 
Assets, Design and UI: Han Xue
